scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第41集:三首月狼·寰苍奇至。

scenes.description: 少妇再没有任何迟疑,两手掐诀一催,身上红色光罩滴溜溜的一阵急转,砰的一声闷响,光罩化为片片的红霞碎裂了开来。

scenes.description: 光罩碎裂后,里面的少妇赫然不见了踪影,但下一刻,五六十丈之外的某处空中红光一闪,少妇婀娜的身形浮现而出。

visual.composition: After light shield shatters, woman inside disappears, but next moment, fifty to sixty zhang away, red light flashes in air, woman's graceful figure appears

scenes.description: 那三名黑瘦青年见到巨人同样骇然,一见少妇逃掉了,这才醒悟过来的同时掐诀,也要施展独门遁术远离近在咫尺的煞星。

visual.composition: Three black thin youths see giant also shocked, seeing woman escaped, realize and simultaneously form seals, also want to use secret escape to flee nearby death star

scenes.description: 但是就在这时,独目巨人忽然一张口,喉咙中发出怪异之声的猛然一吸,顿时狂风大作,三名黑瘦青年只觉一股巨力猛然将护体银光一扯。

visual.composition: But at this moment, one-eyed giant suddenly opens mouth, throat makes strange sound, suddenly inhales, immediately strong wind, three black thin youths feel huge force pulling protective silver light

scenes.description: 三名黑瘦青年就往空中狂拉而去,三人大惊的极力掐动口诀想要对抗,但是连少妇和蓝城主这样化神修士都要落荒而逃,又岂是他们可以轻易对抗的。

visual.composition: Three black thin youths pulled wildly toward sky, three greatly shocked, desperately form seals trying to resist, but even woman and City Lord Lan such Deity Transformation cultivators flee, how can they easily resist

scenes.description: 三名妖修身形一起,被强行的吸离了地面,往巨人血盆大口中送去,这一下,这三名妖修才真的惊恐起来。

visual.composition: One youth suddenly rolls in air, transforms into silver giant wolf several zhang long, this wolf just howls toward high sky

scenes.description: 各浮现出一颗稍小些的青红两色狼首,三颗狼首同时长啸出口,随之银红青三色光霞从狼口中喷出,瞬间加入了护体银光中。

scenes.description: 虽然没有让身形彻底停了下来,但急去之势也马上一顿,立刻大缓了起来,此妖情急之下终于合三为一,回归了三首妖狼的本体。

scenes.description: 隐匿空中的韩立见到此幕,却心中一动,脑中顿时浮现出另一只体态优雅的身影出来,但轻叹了一口气,就将此身影驱逐出了脑中。

visual.composition: Han Li hiding in air sees this, heart moves, mind immediately appears another graceful figure, but sighs lightly, drives this figure from mind

scenes.description: 韩立重将注意力回到下面的情景上,既然水潭是巨人独目幻化而成,那岂不是说那名灵族叛逆已经被这巨人吞噬掉了。

visual.composition: Han Li returns attention to scene below, since pool is giant's single eye transformed, doesn't that mean spirit traitor already devoured by giant

scenes.prompt: Han Li returns attention to scene below, since pool is giant's single eye transformed, doesn't that mean spirit traitor already devoured by giant.

scenes.description: 韩立想,而据他了解,上古巨人一族灵智极其低下,喜欢生啖一切他族之人,根本不可能辨认出什么神血,盛装神血的瓶子,多半在巨人体内了。

visual.composition: Han Li thinks, according to his knowledge, ancient giant race intelligence extremely low, like to devour all other races, cannot recognize divine blood, divine blood vial probably in giant's body

scenes.description: 韩立心中有些嘀咕,但就此让他退却,却又大为的不舍,上古巨人就算是最低阶的种类,成年后也具有炼虚初期那种等阶的神通。

visual.composition: Han Li's heart somewhat uncertain, but to retreat now, greatly unwilling, ancient giants even lowest tier, adults have Void Refinement early level abilities

scenes.description: 这时,三首银狼一连从口中喷出数件宝物,想击破吸力,脱困而逃,但无一不刚一出口,就嗖的一声,直接被浮现的朵朵银色符文一卷,凭空被巨人摄入了大口。

visual.composition: At this time, three-headed silver wolf continuously sprays several treasures from mouth, wants to break suction, escape, but every one just leaving, swoosh sound, directly pulled by silver runes appearing, sucked into giant's mouth

scenes.description: 三首银狼只能单凭本身法力苦苦支撑下去,身形仍徐徐的向巨人大口中飞去,即使巨狼拼命狂喷三色光霞,但仍无法阻止分毫的。

visual.composition: Three-headed silver wolf can only rely on own mana to struggle, body still slowly flies toward giant's mouth, even wolf desperately sprays three-color light, still cannot stop at all

scenes.description: 但就这样,巨人还有些不耐了,突然抬起一只巨掌,仿佛拍苍蝇般的一把向三首狼妖抓去,大片黑影从天而降。

visual.composition: But even so, giant still impatient, suddenly lifts one giant palm, like swatting fly, grabs toward three-headed wolf demon, large shadow descends from sky

visual.composition: Instantly covers wolf demon below, before really grabbing, demon wolf's protective light flames pressed by palm wind, shaking, seems could collapse anytime, caught by such huge terrifying palm, even body hard as iron, will be crushed

scenes.description: 但此狼偏偏被巨力牵制住,根本无法躲避此抓,巨狼不禁目露出了绝望之色,眼见仿佛阁楼般大小的大手就要将三首巨狼一把抓住时,异变突现。

visual.composition: But this wolf trapped by huge force, cannot dodge grab, giant wolf eyes show despair, seeing building-sized hand about to grab three-headed giant wolf, sudden change appears

visual.composition: Suddenly near giant wolf yellow light flashes, thin weak figure eerily appears from void, without a word huffs two punches, it's that Plum Mouse clan elder, Huan Cangqi

scenes.description: 轰轰两声巨响,一只光拳和巨掌一接触,让其只顿了一顿,随之就被巨力一下压的溃散消灭,另一只则正击在妖狼护体光焰上。

visual.composition: Boom boom two loud sounds, one light fist contacts giant palm, makes it pause, then crushed by huge force and disperses, other hits demon wolf's protective light flames
